SELECT id, name FROM pms_category WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND is_show = 1

SELECT c.id, c.name FROM pms_category c JOIN pms_category_spu_relation csr ON ( c.id = csr.category_id AND csr.is_deleted = 0 AND c.is_deleted = 0 ) WHERE c.is_show = 1
AND c.name LIKE CONCAT( #{filter.name} , '%' )
